document_name: Capacity Development for Service Delivery in the Developing Regional States (00074876).pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/ETH/00059740/Capacity Development for Service Delivery in the Developing Regional States (00074876).pdf

outputs.output_descr: This is a joint programme of six UN agencies (UNDP, UNCDF, UNICEF, WFP, WHO and FAO) and aimed to provide collective responses to the multple challenges faced by the four regional states ( Afar, Benishangul, Gambella and Somali) which are lagging behind.  The programme has three major strategic result areas : Improving the Quality of Local Governance, Improving delivery of Basic Social Services and Enhancing Sustainable livelihoods. UNDP  is leading the implimentation of the Local Governance component as well as  supports the sustainable livelihoods component.

project_descr: Public Service Delivery for Accelerating Development Outcomes in Ethiopia's Four Developing Regional States
